channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report X-2023081371
item.description:
Report X-2023081371

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: WALTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED CALL SAYING THERE WAS A LEAKER IN THE IRREG BELT. RESPONDER SAW THAT IT WAS A HAZMAT. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE AND PUT ON THE PROPER PPE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER TRANSPORTED PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
